inlineContent.text: The model type representing the resource being controlled
The model type used for resource creation requests
The model type returned in responses
The model type used for resource update requests
The model type returned for search results
class implements common CRUD operations and search functionality
for a specific resource type. It handles request authorization, route registration,
and provides extension points for customizing behavior.
